hero.description: Decent Public School combines traditional values with modern academic excellence. We nurture intellectual curiosity, moral integrity, and social responsibility in every student.

scrollingBanner.text: Welcome to Decent Public School - Admissions Open 2026-27

testimonials.name: Mrs. Priya Sharma
testimonials.content: My daughter has been studying here for the last few years. The teachers are sincere and give proper attention to students. Discipline is good and we are satisfied with her progress.

testimonials.name: Mr. Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.content: The school environment is safe and teachers are cooperative. We get regular updates about our child. Fees are reasonable compared to other schools in the area.

testimonials.name: Anita Devi
testimonials.content: The teachers helped my daughter a lot during her board preparation. They were supportive and guided students properly. We are thankful to the school staff.

testimonials.name: Rohit Das
testimonials.content: Teachers explain topics clearly and are helpful when we ask doubts. I like the school discipline and sports activities.

testimonials.name: Puja Kalita
testimonials.content: I enjoy coming to school. Teachers are kind and help us in studies and activities. Our classrooms are clean and comfortable.

testimonials.name: Aman Hazarika
testimonials.content: The school helped me stay focused on my studies. Teachers guide us well, especially during exams.

visionMission.vision: To be a leading educational institution that nurtures future leaders with strong values, academic excellence, and a global perspective.
visionMission.mission: To provide quality education that develops intellectual curiosity, critical thinking, and moral integrity in every student.
